Value: Mod turned on during gameplay, no fixes are applied. Reboot the game for fixes to take effect.
Mod fixes changed during gameplay. Reboot the game for changes to take effect.
Use this button when applying fixes on an existing save, if required by the fix (see changelogs). Cannot be reverted - keep backups, load to an earlier save
Ranged touch attack which deals Acid damage and may cause Nauseated.
Halflings are proficient with slings, and treat sling staves as martial weapons.
This +1 speed sling is sized for a kobold, and might require some more strength to deal real damage.
You're pretty certain you've never seen a kobold use a sling before. Or much of anyone in the Stolen Lands.
This +4 sling deals 1d6 damage, and launches large rocks, yet its clumsiness and weight impose a -2 penalty on the wielder's attack rolls.
The Dire Narlmarches are famous for their unique slings, but this does not seem like a local craft.
This throws exceptionally large rocks, adding 1-1/2 times your Strength modifier on damage rolls.
Weapon is exceptionally small and deals less damage, and Medium or larger creatures suffer a penalty of -2 to attack rolls.
